page.title: 10LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
As in many rural areas,the {facilities}available for leisure activities are not so great as those in towns.For example those wishing to go to the cinema must travel some miles to Northallerton.There are sometimes amateur shows put on at nearby Leyburn but the nearest professional theatre is the Georgian Theatre at Richmond.Swimming baths are also at Richmond.Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides are at Leyburn.In Leyburn there are also the local sports clubs.
In the area itself there are opportunities for walking,fishing or birdwatching.Ladies can meet monthly at the Women's Institute.There is the occasional whist or domino drive.Many people meet and talk in the evenings at the local pub.Young Farmers groups meet each week.
